title: Syntus 0.45X Wide Lens and 12.5X Macro Lens Attachment Clip-on Cell Phone Camera Lenses Kit for iPhone 7 6s 6 5s, Samsung Galaxy, Android Smartphones
feature: Top-grade Quality - Crafted with aluminum alloy and multi-element coated glass to minimize lens glare, reflection, ghosting and other artifacts for better vision.
0.45X Wide Angle Lens - Convex lens, expand the filed of vision with ultra-low distortion and no dark corners.
12.5X Macro Lens - 12.5X closer to object, capture details at a distance of 1.18-1.97 inches.
Waterproof & Anti-soil - Multilayer coatings covered on the surface of lens to prevent from water and pollution.
Considerate Design - Constructed with detachable soft rubber clip. Easy to adjust without leaving scratches on mobile device.
description: Are you still troubled with an "incomplete" family shot ? will bring you a whole group photo with ultra-low distortion when your cell phone cannot make it alone. enables you to take a close-up look at object as close as 1.18-1.97 inches , perfect for insects flowers as well as tiny delicate items.Now affix the lenses with perfect alignment to any mobile device and you will see what you want!Macro Lens and Wide Angle Lens are attached together while you receive them.If you want to use the Wide Angle Lens, please screw the two lens together.If you want to use the Macro Lens, please unscrew two lens apart.Please make sure if your phone's camera lens is visibly centered.Image quality may be affected without a good light.Syntus Cellphone Lens Kit is not a zoom lens.1 x 0.45X HD Wide Angle Lens1 x 12.5X Macro Lens (Screwed with the Wide Angle Lens)1 x Universal 37mm Thread Clip2 x Lens Cover1 x PU Pouch
